definitions.definition: A defect of a lens such that light rays coming from a point do not meet at a focal point so that the image is blurred.
A disorder of the vision, usually due to a misshapen cornea , such that light does not focus correctly on the retina causing a blurred image.

main_definition: ( optics ) A defect of a lens such that light rays coming from a point do not meet at a focal point so that the image is blurred.
secondary_definitions: ( pathology ) A disorder of the vision, usually due to a misshapen cornea , such that light does not focus correctly on the retina causing a blurred image.
